scripts.start: directus bootstrap && node apply.js  && directus start
scripts.start:prod: set NODE_ENV=production&& directus bootstrap && node apply.js  && directus start
scripts.save: rm -rf snapshot && directus schema snapshot --yes ./snapshot.yaml && npm run split
scripts.apply: rm -rf merged-snapshot.yaml && npm run merge && directus schema apply --yes ./merged-snapshot.yaml
scripts.dry: rm -rf merged-snapshot.yaml && npm run merge && directus schema apply --dry-run ./merged-snapshot.yaml
